name: SMT Like Dungeon Crawler Prototype
description:
A project I started a while ago that I have decided to try go back to. Looking for feedback on game feel and maybe bugs if you find them. Next steps are dialogue system. and a battle system. May upload another demo after that has been created.

Pressing Enter or Space will deplete health. I haven't added a game over screen yet so depleting health to 0 will just freeze the game. Avoid this feature for now.
